channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: QLoRA: Efficient Finetuning of Quantized LLMs
item.description: Our best model family, which we name Guanaco, outperforms all previous openly released models on the Vicuna benchmark, reaching 99. 3% of the performance level of ChatGPT while only requiring 24 hours of finetuning on a single GPU.

item.title: Tree of Thoughts: Deliberate Problem Solving with Large Language Models
item.description: Language models are increasingly being deployed for general problem solving across a wide range of tasks, but are still confined to token-level, left-to-right decision-making processes during inference.

item.title: Uni-ControlNet: All-in-One Control to Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
item.description: Text-to-Image diffusion models have made tremendous progress over the past two years, enabling the generation of highly realistic images based on open-domain text descriptions.

item.title: Sophia: A Scalable Stochastic Second-order Optimizer for Language Model Pre-training
item.description: Given the massive cost of language model pre-training, a non-trivial improvement of the optimization algorithm would lead to a material reduction on the time and cost of training.

item.title: Drag Your GAN: Interactive Point-based Manipulation on the Generative Image Manifold
item.description: Synthesizing visual content that meets users' needs often requires flexible and precise controllability of the pose, shape, expression, and layout of the generated objects.

item.title: VisionLLM: Large Language Model is also an Open-Ended Decoder for Vision-Centric Tasks
item.description: We hope this model can set a new baseline for generalist vision and language models.

item.title: EasySpider: A No-Code Visual System for Crawling the Web
item.description: As such, web-crawling is an essential tool for both computational and non-computational scientists to conduct research.

item.title: Enhancing Detail Preservation for Customized Text-to-Image Generation: A Regularization-Free Approach
item.description: However, generating images of novel concept provided by the user input image is still a challenging task.

item.title: Any-to-Any Generation via Composable Diffusion
item.description: We present Composable Diffusion (CoDi), a novel generative model capable of generating any combination of output modalities, such as language, image, video, or audio, from any combination of input modalities.

item.title: Prompt-Free Diffusion: Taking "Text" out of Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
item.description: Text-to-image (T2I) research has grown explosively in the past year, owing to the large-scale pre-trained diffusion models and many emerging personalization and editing approaches.

item.title: AlpacaFarm: A Simulation Framework for Methods that Learn from Human Feedback
item.description: As a demonstration of the research possible in AlpacaFarm, we find that methods that use a reward model can substantially improve over supervised fine-tuning and that our reference PPO implementation leads to a +10% improvement in win-rate against Davinci003.

item.title: VanillaNet: the Power of Minimalism in Deep Learning
item.description: In this study, we introduce VanillaNet, a neural network architecture that embraces elegance in design.

item.title: Speech-to-speech translation for a real-world unwritten language
item.description: We use English-Taiwanese Hokkien as a case study, and present an end-to-end solution from training data collection, modeling choices to benchmark dataset release.

item.title: Facebook AI’s WMT21 News Translation Task Submission
item.description: We describe Facebook’s multilingual model submission to the WMT2021 shared task on news translation.

item.title: fairseq
item.description: Facebook AI Research Sequence-to-Sequence Toolkit written in Python.

item.title: Scaling Speech Technology to 1,000+ Languages
item.description: Expanding the language coverage of speech technology has the potential to improve access to information for many more people.

item.title: RecurrentGPT: Interactive Generation of (Arbitrarily) Long Text
item.description: In addition to producing AI-generated content (AIGC), we also demonstrate the possibility of using RecurrentGPT as an interactive fiction that directly interacts with consumers.

item.title: ControlVideo: Training-free Controllable Text-to-Video Generation
item.description: Text-driven diffusion models have unlocked unprecedented abilities in image generation, whereas their video counterpart still lags behind due to the excessive training cost of temporal modeling.

item.title: ExpertPrompting: Instructing Large Language Models to be Distinguished Experts
item.description: The answering quality of an aligned large language model (LLM) can be drastically improved if treated with proper crafting of prompts.

item.title: C-Eval: A Multi-Level Multi-Discipline Chinese Evaluation Suite for Foundation Models
item.description: We present C-Eval, the first comprehensive Chinese evaluation suite designed to assess advanced knowledge and reasoning abilities of foundation models in a Chinese context.
